Hi! I’m looking for a VW beetle 1.2A TSI  wondering if this model beetle have any problems?

The VW Beetle 1.2A TSI generally has a good reputation for reliability. However  like any car  there can be issues to be aware of. It's a good idea to research common problems reported by owners and have a thorough inspection conducted by a trusted mechanic before making a purchase. Also  check for any recalls or known issues specific to that model year.
